title: More connectivity between Joburg and Bloemfontein as Airlink adds 5th flight
text:
YOU MIGHT ALSO LIKE {{item.title}}

Travelling between Bloemfontein and Johannesburg just got a little easier as Airlink adds a fifth flight between the two cities.

The additional midday flight will operate from Mondays to Fridays starting from 18 November 2019, and will be serviced by an Embraer 135 jet.

READ: Competition to connect SA to its regional neighbours heats up

Here are the times:

ORT 12:30 BFN 13:25

BFN 13:50 ORT 14:45

"The introduction of the midday flight allows customers to choose from five flights per day offering added convenience and flexibility. The flights connect easily with domestic, regional and long-haul flights allowing travelers to spend less time in transit at the airport," says Airlink in a statement.

The airline services 55 routes in Southern Africa.
